coraa.origin.lastern.description: A stealthy assassin who strikes from the shadows.
coraa.powers.resentment_bar.description: Fuelled by grudge, shaped by gloom — it stirs in silence and strikes in shadow.
death.attack.coraa.schattenslash.player: %1$s's got ambushed by %2$s from the shadows
death.attack.coraa.solaris_eclat: %1$s's torso got pierced by holy bullets
